about_the_game:
Sivers — A Vector-Style RPG Roguelike

Dive into the unique world of Sivers — a dynamic RPG roguelike where every battle and decision can be crucial for survival! In this game, you’ll fight off waves of monsters using a construction system and powerful spells to hold your ground for as long as possible.

Game Features:

  • 43 Spells: Choose from magical, physical, and passive spells to adapt to various situations and defeat your enemies.

  • 8 Bosses and 20 Types of Enemies: Each wave of monsters gets progressively harder, with unique mechanics. Enemies and bosses require different strategies and spell combinations.

  • 4 Types of Structures: Build towers, fences, mines, and spawners for allied units to strengthen your defense.

  • Flexible Progression System: Earn experience and building points for every enemy you defeat. Upgrade your hero’s stats and unlock new construction possibilities.

  • Runes and Secret Shops: Collect runes for bonuses, and don't forget to visit the secret shop where you can use coins to unlock new abilities.

  • Difficulty Selection: Adjust the game’s difficulty to either increase the challenge or make it easier on yourself.

  • Intuitive Interface and Smooth Building Mechanics: Easily upgrade your structures and keep track of their development in real-time.

The game continues to evolve with each update, adding new abilities, mechanics, and possibilities. Fight, build, survive — and find your path to victory!

short_description: Sivers is a vector-style RPG roguelike where you’ll fight waves of enemies using 43 spells and a building system. Build defenses and upgrade your hero, then try to survive against 5 bosses and 11 types of enemies. You definitely won’t win on your first try — but give it a shot!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian
